data.title: Pesach at the Begin Center
data.meta_description: Enjoy loads of family activities at the Menachem Begin Heritage Center this Pesach!
data.text:
There is so much for all the family this Pesach at the Menachem Begin Heritage Center.

Haven’t you been to the Begin Museum yet? We invite you to get acquainted with the fascinating life story of one of the most prominent leaders since the establishment of the state. Hear Menachem Begin’s voice and read from his pen. Together we will go through different chapters of his life: we will walk with him through the streets of his childhood in Europe, we will attend a meeting of Irgun leaders, sit on the couch in his living room, hear his famous speeches in the square, join an election rally and accompany him in his dramatic moments as prime minister. A visit to the museum is not just an encounter with Menachem Begin’s personal journey, but an encounter with the story of us all!

Theatrical Tours: His way, our journey

A series of dramatized tours for the whole family following the stages of Menachem Begin’s life, to mark the 30th anniversary of his death. Join us on a farm trip – From childhood to prime minister – a meeting with some of the most prominent events in Menachem Begin’s life story: an underground fighter, the peacemaker with Egypt or a social justice fighter – all in one tour in a meeting with actors throughout the tour.

Musical Tours: String from the Past

When the stories meet the songs – join us on an experiential journey following the songs that accompanied the most significant historical events in the history of Jerusalem The tour is accompanied by a player who combines stories, anecdotes and of course songs.

Escape Boxes

Are you a team player? Are you resourceful, creative and good at solving puzzles? If so, the museum needs you! A rare treasure of enormous historical importance and of great value has been stolen from the archives of the Begin Heritage Center. They need your help to crack the mystery and find the treasure.

Interactive Walking Tours

Come and experience the struggle for the underground for independence using your smartphone. You are invited to an exciting audio experience in the alleys of Yemin Moshe and Mishkenot Sha’ananim from the days of the establishment of the state. With the headphones of your smartphone, you can enter the world of one of the underground fighters, a resident of Mishkenot Sha’ananim, and tour with him around the beautiful neighborhood. The advanced sound technology will envelop you in the voices of the neighborhood, with the underground fighter, a member of the neighborhood, walking beside you, sharing his story with you. The experience is personal-family, and is suitable for ages 10-100. Downloadable through the Begin Center website Cost: 10 NIS
